javadoc:
Base implementation of file in a {@link GFileSystem filesystem}.

Only valid while the owning filesystem object is still open and not {@link GFileSystem#close() closed}.

See {@link GFile}.

methods.name: fromPathString
methods.comment:
Creates a GFile for a filesystem using a string
 path (ie. "dir/subdir/filename"), with the path starting at the root of the
 filesystem.
 
 The parents of this GFile are created fresh from any directory names
 in the path string.  It is better to use the
 #fromFilename(GFileSystem, GFile, String, boolean, long, FSRL) method
 to create GFile instances if you can supply the parent value as that will
 allow reuse of the parent objects instead of duplicates of them being created
 for each file with the same parent path.

params.name: fileSystem
params.comment: the GFileSystem that owns this file

params.name: path
params.comment: forward slash '/' separated path and filename string.

params.name: fsrl
params.comment: FSRL to assign to the file, NULL if an auto-created FSRL is ok.

params.name: isDirectory
params.comment: boolean flag to indicate that this is a directory

params.name: length
params.comment: length of the file (use -1 if not know or specified).

methods.name: fromPathString
methods.comment:
Creates a GFile for a specific owning filesystem using a string
 path (ie. "dir/subdir/filename"), with the path starting at the supplied
  directory.
 
 The parents of this GFile are created fresh from any directory names
 in the path string.  It is better to use the
 #fromFilename(GFileSystem, GFile, String, boolean, long, FSRL) method
 to create GFile instances if you can supply the parent value as that will
 allow reuse of the parent objects instead of duplicates of them being created
 for each file with the same parent path.

params.name: fileSystem
params.comment: the GFileSystem that owns this file

params.name: parent
params.comment: the parent of the new GFile or null if child-of-root.

params.name: path
params.comment: forward slash '/' separated path and filename string.

params.name: fsrl
params.comment: FSRL to assign to the file, NULL if an auto-created FSRL is ok.

params.name: isDirectory
params.comment: boolean flag to indicate that this is a directory

params.name: length
params.comment: length of the file (use -1 if not know or specified).

methods.name: getFSRLFromParent
methods.comment:
Creates a FSRL for a file based on the either the filesystem's FSRLRoot or parent
 directory's FSRL, preferring a parent directory over the filesystem's FSRL.

params.name: fs
params.comment: GFileSystem

params.name: parent
params.comment: GFile parent directory, null ok

params.name: path
params.comment: string path to assign to the FSRL

methods.name: fromFilename
methods.comment:
Creates a GFile for a filesystem using a simple name (not a path)
 and as a child of the specified parent.
 
 The filename is accepted without checking or validation.

params.name: fileSystem
params.comment: the GFileSystem that owns this file

params.name: parent
params.comment: the parent of the new GFile or null if child-of-root.

params.name: filename
params.comment: the file's name, not used if FSRL param specified.

params.name: isDirectory
params.comment: boolean flag to indicate that this is a directory

params.name: length
params.comment: length of the file (use -1 if not know or specified).

params.name: fsrl
params.comment: FSRL to assign to the file, NULL if an auto-created FSRL is ok.

methods.name: fromFSRL
methods.comment:
Creates a GFile for a filesystem using the information in a FSRL as the file's name
 and as a child of the specified parent.

params.name: fileSystem
params.comment: the GFileSystem that owns this file

params.name: parent
params.comment: the parent of the new GFile or null if child-of-root.

params.name: fsrl
params.comment: FSRL to assign to the file.

params.name: isDirectory
params.comment: boolean flag to indicate that this is a directory

params.name: length
params.comment: length of the file (use -1 if not know or specified).

methods.name: <init>
methods.comment:
Protected constructor, use static helper methods to create new instances.
 
 Creates a new GFile instance without any name parsing.

params.name: fileSystem
params.comment: the GFileSystem that owns this file

params.name: parentFile
params.comment: the parent of the new GFile or null if child-of-root.

params.name: isDirectory
params.comment: boolean flag to indicate that this is a directory

params.name: length
params.comment: length of the file (use -1 if not know or specified).

params.name: fsrl
params.comment: FSRL to assign to the file.

name: GFileImpl
comment:
Base implementation of file in a GFileSystem.
 
 Only valid while the owning filesystem object is still open and not
 GFileSystem#close().
 
 See GFile.
